alert.note: Alert for Ventura County Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 06 at 9:09PM PST until March 07 at 2:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM PST MONDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 2 PM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Frost Advisory, temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation near Ojai. For the Wind Advisory, northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected, mainly eastern portions. * WHERE...Ventura County Interior Valleys. * WHEN...For the Frost Advisory, from 1 AM to 9 AM PST Monday. For the Wind Advisory, from 4 AM to 2 PM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.
